title: Generic QA Response Schema
description: Template JSON schema for playbook QA verification responses. Copy and customize for specific playbook needs.

item_id.description: Identifier for the item being QA'd (from worker response)

verdict.description: QA verdict: pass = work acceptable, fail = send back to worker, escalate = cannot be resolved by QA

document_verification.description: Verification of each evidence document cited by the worker. MUST verify every document.

evidence_num.description: Evidence item number from worker response

exists.description: Whether the document was found at the specified path

supports_finding.description: Whether the document section supports the worker's finding

comments.description: Required summary of QA verification work performed. MUST always be provided, even for passing verdicts.

evidence_num.description: Evidence item number related to this issue

issues.description: List of issues found during QA. Empty array if no issues.

_playbook_customization_notes.note: This is a template. Customize for your playbook:
steps: 1. Copy this schema to your playbook's schemas/ directory
2. Adjust item_id field name to match your worker schema
3. Add domain-specific verification checks if needed
4. Customize issue types for your domain
automatic_failure_conditions: Document cited in evidence cannot be found at specified path
Section does not contain content supporting the worker's claim
Evidence paths are missing or incomplete

document_verification.notes: Confirmed section contains management commitment statement dated 2024-03-15

example.comments: Verified all evidence documents exist and support the worker's finding. Management commitment is clearly documented in referenced sections.
